name: LittleFlashcardProject
description: I've been thinking about the possibility that one of my next little projects could be a trivia game. Then I realized that maybe it would be better if I contributed by adding some content before the questionnaires. So I've been making a little prototype of flashcards to see if it could be a good way to add these contents. I am still not very clear if it will be the best way to accomplish it.
